name: Xiao
title: Vigilant Yaksha
description: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

normal.1: Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
plunging.2: Xiao does not take DMG from performing Plunging Attacks.

description.0: Xiao lunges forward, dealing <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo> to opponents in his path.
description.4: According to the legends of another land, the world will someday be crushed by two great wind wheels. Xiao's mastery over polearms is transcendent, ripping his foes apart like those legendary wind wheels.

description.0: Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago.
3: Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG.
Converts attack DMG into <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
description.5: In this state, Xiao will continuously lose HP.
description.6: The effects of this skill end when Xiao leaves the field.
description.8: Donning the Mask of the Yaksha, Xiao takes the terrifying, demon-conquering form of the Vigilant Yaksha. But this great power has also brought him great suffering. Some call him "The Bane of All Evil."

passive1.name: Conqueror of Evil: Tamer of Demons

description.0: While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%. DMG increases by a further 5% for every 3s the ability persists.
Using Lemniscatic Wind Cycling increases the DMG of subsequent uses of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 15%.
description.1: This effect lasts for 7s, and has a maximum of 3 stacks. Gaining a new stack refreshes the effect's duration.

description.0: Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
description.1: Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

description.0: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.
Increases the Level of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 3.
When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.
Increases the Level of Bane of All Evil by 3.

While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.
